EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners / Dan Hiemstra (1328205711.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / Dan Hiemstra (1328205711.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Consultant Services Email 1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Dan,
No worries, I completely understand how life gets busy! Congratulations on finding your project, I hope you are enjoying it so far.
If you have a need for our services in the future or just have any general questions please do not hesitate to reach out to me and I will be happy to assist you!
Thank you and have a great day, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Dan Hiemstra [mailto:danhiemstra@me.com] Sent: Tuesday, January 31, 2012 9:58 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Dan Hiemstra
Hi Nicolette,
Sorry I didn't respond to your earlier email, but things were a bit hectic with the holidays and then a flood of contract opportunities. I finally landed an 18 month contract with Wells Fargo, doing Infrastructure project management work. I've been on the job for a week and so far so good.
I'll take a look at the resources and pass on any feedback I may have.
Dan...
On Jan 31, 2012, at 11:50 AM, Nicolette Taylor wrote:
Hello Dan,
I wanted to touch base as a courtesy and see how the contract search is going.
We have a number of consultant resources that we continually update that you may find helpful. You may find them here: http://www.mbopartners.com/resources. In addition, if you have any suggestions for new resources that might help other consultants - please let us know!
Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you.
Regards, Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Enrollment Manager MBO Partners
t: (703) 793-6281 f: 703.793.6081 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
